java.lang.Object
controller.ViewController

public class ViewController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The controller for the View screen.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the ViewController. This method calls init methods for each table (appt, customer, report), fills month report ComboBox, and defines action methods for various functionalities.

      Lambda expression: I am using an Array stream on the Month values array so that I can use the forEach lambda expression. This lambda expression fills the months ObservableList that will be used for the month report ComboBox data. The use of the lambda expression allows for much more readable and more efficient code. It is more readable because it simplifies the for-each loop into a single line that can be read like a normal line of words. ("In the stream of month values, each month's name will be added to the list of months.")

      The remaining lambda expressions define functionalities for various GUI items. These functionalities include:

      • Type/Month Calculation Button
      • User/Customer Calculation Button
      • Appointments by Contact ComboBox
      • Each View Radio Button for Appointments (all, month, week)
      • Report tab selection (to reset report selections)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - url
      resourceBundle - resource bundle

    • setTab

      public void setTab(int tab)
      Open desired tab in the View screen. If tab param is valid (non-negative and less than size of tab list), set as selected tab.
      Parameters:
      tab - index of tab to select

    • initAppointmentTable

      public void initAppointmentTable()
      Initializes main appointment table. This method sets table columns to corresponding values and displays all appointments by default, sorted by ID.

    • initReportTable

      public void initReportTable()
      Initializes appointment by contact report table. This method sets table columns to corresponding values.

    • resetReportTab

      public void resetReportTab()
      Resets report tab fields. This method fills the combo boxes, clears calculation labels, and clears appointments by contacts table.

    • initCustomerTable

      public void initCustomerTable()
      Initializes main customer table. This method sets table columns to corresponding values and displays all customers, sorted by ID.

    • onAddAppointment

      public void onAddAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On button click, switches to schedule appointment form. This method validates selection and launches Appointment form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event

    • onUpdateAppointment

      public void onUpdateAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On button click, switches to update appointment form. This method validates selection and calls populate() method inside controller to pre-populate all fields with selected appointment information.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event

    • onCancelAppointment

      public void onCancelAppointment(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On button click, cancel selected appointment. This method validates selection and attempts to delete from the database. On successful deletion, refresh appointment table and display proper dialog box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event

    • onAddCustomer

      public void onAddCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On button click, switches to customer registration form.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event

    • onUpdateCustomer

      public void onUpdateCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On button click, switch to customer update form. This method validates selection and calls populate() method inside controller to pre-populate all fields with selected customer information.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event

    • onDeleteCustomer

      public void onDeleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On button click, delete selected customer. This method validates selection and checks customer's appointments, then attempts to delete customer from database. On successful deletion, refresh customer table and display proper dialog box.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - action event
